abstract: The new version is an appeal to an elite class of hard-core game players who would like a little more of everything.
snippet: The new version is an appeal to an elite class of hard-core game players who would like a little more of everything.
lead_paragraph: Raising the ante in the video game wars, Microsoft is bringing out a new version of the Xbox 360 game machine that has a bigger hard drive, better high-definition video support and a stylish black finish, not an insignificant feature in a world where looking cool ranks high.

headline.main: Upgraded Version of Xbox 360 to Be Introduced by Microsoft
headline.print_headline: Upgraded Version of Xbox 360 To Be Introduced by Microsoft

abstract: DoubleClick, an online advertising company controlled by a private equity firm, Hellman & Friedman, is exploring a sale and is in talks with potential suitors including Microsoft, the Wall Street Journal reported. DoubleClick was publicly traded in 2005 when it agreed to be acquired by Hellman & Friedman for about $1.1 billion. The firm is hoping to get at least $2 billion in a DoubleClick sale, a source told the Journal.
